attributes.action: reduce the cost of Historical Birth, Marriage & Death Certificates to the actual cost of producing & sending them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The cheapest way of obtaining a Birth, Marriage or Death certificate is through the GRO website online at a costly £7.00 Per Certificate & the cost of them is what puts many people off of tracing their heritage, as this is the only method of accurately tracing Ancestors. The production of these certificates costs far less than what is being charged, leaving the researcher deep out of pocket and the government making huge profits on something that our Ancestors already once paid for in their lifetime.
